Literally sold to a master teacher, Sergei Rippas (Tarmo Manni) by his mother when he was still a child, the violin prodigy was forcefully and strictly raised to practice, practice, and perfect his technique. Once an adult, Arsi finds a way to escape the rigors of a U.S. tour and drowns his overworked self in drink, or seeks out one-night stands, or otherwise lets off steam. The tightly-wound spring that has been coiled since he was forced into his grueling training and work sessions -- shown through symbolic images -- eventually snaps in a healthy way, freeing Arsi at last to continue on, simply for the love of music.","popularity":2.47,"poster_path":"/qOpmTjHV74StdTmtybSzfobeL6w.jpg","release_date":"1985-08-16","title":"Da Capo","video":false,"vote_average":2.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/qvGKwveQKOwafSwJFCkdF0HFFXn.jpg","genre_ids":[27,35],"id":544756,"original_language":"sl","original_title":"Prekletstvo Valburge","overview":"Two crooks looking to scam tourists organize a tour of an abandoned manor house rumored to be haunted by the cousin of Count Dracula.
